title: Number of expressways gas stations , by provider in France 2018
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of gas stations for 9 number of Companys.
The maximum Number of gas stations 121.0 is found at Company Total and the minimum is found at Dyneff where Number of gas stations is 8.0.
There is a difference of 113.0 between the maximum Company Total and minimum Company Dyneff.
min_summary: This bar chart has 9 columns on the x axis representing Company, and Number of gas stations in each Company on the y axis.
The Number of gas stations is highest at Company Total and lowest at Company Dyneff.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of gas stations for 9 number of Companys.
The maximum Number of gas stations 121.0 is found at Company Total and the minimum is found at Dyneff where Number of gas stations is 8.0.
There is a difference of 113.0 between the maximum Company Total and minimum Company Dyneff.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of gas stations for 9 number of Companys.
The Number of gas stations is appeared to be the highest at Company Total and lowest at Company Dyneff.
The difference of Number of gas stations between the highest and lowest Company is 113.0.
Number of gas stations at Company Total is 121.0 , second place is  at 121.0, and thirdly is Shell at 69.0.
Company Eni, and Esso share the same value 46.0.
Considered together, the average Number of gas stations in all 9 Companys is roughly 49.22.
The Number of gas stations is 443.0 if we add up values of all Companys.
